softwares.description: Ubuntu Server brings economic and technical scalability to your datacentre, public or private.

provisionSchemaForm.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"componentName":{"title":"Virtual Machine Name","type":"string","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z_\\-]+$","maxLength":15,"validationMessage":"Length must be 1-15 and Alphanumeric, underscore, and hyphen"},"accessKeyId":{"title":"AWS Access Key Id","type":"string","default":"AKIAIDG5O6PE2JWMO5FQ"},"secretKeyId":{"title":"Secret Key","type":"string","default":""},"location":{"title":"Region","type":"string","default":"US_EAST_1","enum":["US_EAST_1","US_WEST_1","US_WEST_2","EU_WEST_1","EU_CENTRAL_1","AP_SOUTH_1","AP_SOUTHEAST_1","AP_SOUTHEAST_2","AP_NORTHEAST_1","AP_NORTHEAST_2","SA_EAST_1","CN_NORTH_1"]},"vmSize":{"title":"VM Size","type":"string","default":"t2.micro","enum":["t2.micro"]},"imageId":{"title":"AWS Image Id","type":"string","default":"ami-f4cc1de2"},"provider":{"type":"string","default":"AWS"}},"required":["componentName","accessKeyId","secretKeyId","location","clientSecret","location","vmSize","imageId","provider"]}

softwares.description: Windows Server is a brand name for a group of server operating systems released by Microsoft.
RHEL is a Linux distribution developed by Red Hat and targeted toward the commercial market.
